sentences.en: This latest incident could derail the peace process.
sentences.cn: 最近这个事件可能会扰乱和平进程。

sentences.en: The present wave of political killings is the work of people trying to derail peace talks.
sentences.cn: 现在的政治谋杀浪潮是那些试图破坏和平谈判进程的人所为。

sentences.en: Policymakers should not allow low energy prices to derail the clean energy transition.
sentences.cn: 制定政策者不应让低能源价格破坏清洁能源的转型。
